name: places/ChIJhW4ZH5BZwokRTTXRG1_Ix_A
formattedAddress: 232 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012, USA
adrFormatAddress: 232 Mercer St, New York, NY 10012-1507, USA

originalText.text: I use their high pressure beds and they always get me a nice tan. I like that the place is smaller than other tanning salons, which makes it feel somehow cozier and more private. Their prices are affordable for students (they have student discount) and I usually get a complimentary session with a package purchase. The location is super convenient for me because it's just next to my gym so I do not have to deal with an extra time loss when switching between places. This salon is never too crowded (I go in the morning though) and the staff is nice and friendly.

originalText.text: I'd rate it 5 stars as its tanning beds are high quality, but they sell a Groupon to get people into the 2 tanning beds they have when they're a "weight loss salon" normally as the main business and thus tanners these days may be surprised by what they find. But 3 tans for $25 on Groupon? 100% worth it, can't complain.

originalText.text: Great service and attentive staff.  I went here for the first time, and upon arriving, I was greeted by the staff at the front desk who then prompted me to fill out a detail form so recommendations can be given for someone who has fair skin and prefer not to get too dark, but just a base tan.  Then I was escorted to the stand up booth, where I was given detail instructions of how to operate the machine.  There were no pressure to buy any of the lotions, products, or sessions like some other places I've gone to.  Definitely recommend for those looking to  get a little color for whatever occasion or just because.

originalText.text: Joanna and her staff provide the best 5 star service in the area, she’s very knowledgeable of the industry, super friendly and always have the best chocolates waiting for your arrival. This is by far my favorite tanning salon in NYC.

text.text: Joanna and her staff provide the best 5 star service in the area, she’s very knowledgeable of the industry, super friendly and always have the best chocolates waiting for your arrival. This is by far my favorite tanning salon in NYC.

originalText.text: Had a great experience here! Staff was very knowledgable and I was in and out every time in under 20min. Recommend this location to anyone.
